mapper.select: select year(base_date) as "year",sex as "sex",count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from company_social_security inner join person on company_social_security.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where industry_code = "${industry_code}" group by year,sex order by year,sex

select year(base_date) as "year",sex as "sex",count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from company_social_security inner join person on company_social_security.social_security_card=person.social_security_card group by year,sex order by year,sex

select year(base_date) as "year", case when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>50) then "50岁以上" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>40) then "40岁—50岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>30) then "30岁—40岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>25) then "25岁—30岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>22) then "22岁—25岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>=18) then "18岁—22岁" else "18岁以下 " end as "age", count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from company_social_security inner join person on company_social_security.social_security_card=person.social_security_card -- where industry_code = "租赁和商务服务业" where industry_code = "${industry_code}" group by year,age order by year,age

select year(base_date) as "year", case when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>50) then "50岁以上" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>40) then "40岁—50岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>30) then "30岁—40岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>25) then "25岁—30岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>22) then "22岁—25岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>=18) then "18岁—22岁" else "18岁以下 " end as "age", count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from company_social_security inner join person on company_social_security.social_security_card=person.social_security_card group by year,age order by year,age
select year(base_date) as "year",industry_code,avg(social_insurance_base) as cardinality from company_social_security group by year,industry_code order by year,cardinality DESC
